products.title: Performance Dry-Grip Yoga Mat (5mm)
products.body_html:
Get deeper into your posture during a hot yoga practice when you’re slip- and worry-free on our Performance Dry-Grip Yoga mat from our premium line of yoga mats created for yogis, by yogis. This mat is created with a topcoat that promises to wick away moisture and provide a better grip as temperatures in class rise. The rubber-free construction is also perfect for those with latex sensitivity. And with 5mm of cushioning, it’s also soft on your joints. Manufactured free of the top six most harmful phthalates, this mat is a healthy choice for both you and the planet.

  • Our best-selling yoga mat
  • No-slip mat ideal for hot yoga
  • Wicks away moisture to secure your grip
  • 5mm of premium cushion
  • Supports you and your joints
  • Lightweight and durable 
  • Rubber, Latex, and 6P free
  • Comes with our lifetime guarantee

Professional Quality: Our performance line of professional quality products are designed by yogis, for yogis, and created to inspire mindful movement. These products are designed with care and attention to high-quality materials, thoughtful design, and durable construction. Whether for personal or professional use, these products are built to last. Find the perfect mat or accessory that’s right for you and shop the rest of our Performance Line.

Measurements: 68"L x 24"W x 5mm; 4.25lbs. 

Materials: PVC. Latex-Free.  6P Free: Free of DEHP, DBP, BBP, DINP, DIDP, and DNOP phthalates.

Care Instructions: Yoga mats release a very strong but harmless odor when first unwrapped. Please unroll and air out your mat for 2-3 days before use. Spot clean with our Yoga Mat Wash or damp cloth with cold water and mild detergent. Dry flat. The mat may fade and become brittle and unusable if exposed to the sun for extended periods of time. We recommend storing your mat in a mat bag when not in use. Learn more about How to Remove That New Yoga Mat Smell.

products.title: Reversible Metallic Sun & Moon Yoga Mat (6mm)
products.body_html:
Find celestial yoga inspiration in the strength and vitality of the sun and the goddess-like qualities of the moon. Just flip over this reversible mat to find the image that matches your yoga mood at the moment. Made of latex-free PVC, our Sun & Moon metallic mat is 6mm thick for supreme cushioning and features a textured, “sticky” surface. Includes lifetime mat guarantee.

The rubber-free construction is perfect for those with latex sensitivities.

products.title: Gaiam Foldable Yoga Mat (2mm)
products.body_html:
Our 2mm Foldable Yoga Mat is ultra lightweight, highly compact, and super cute. This mat folds flat and easily fits in your carry-on or tote bag, making to and from studio travel easier than ever. With a sticky texture and compatibility, you will stand strong in your Warrior II on any weekend getaway, retreat or trip across town.

  • Folds into a compact 10" x 12" square
  • Ideal for yoga on the go
  • Super cute and colorful designs
  • Sticky texture keeps you in place
  • Comes with our lifetime guarantee

Measurements: 68"L x 24"W x 2mm, 3 lbs

Materials: Latex-free PVC

Care Instructions: Spot clean with our Yoga Mat Wash or damp cloth with cold water and mild detergent. Dry flat. The mat may fade and become brittle and unusable if exposed to the sun for extended periods of time. We recommend storing your mat in a mat bag when not in use.

products.body_html:
The Ballerina Yoga Mat will inspire your kid to spin, twist, twirl, and maybe even strike a dancer's yoga pose. This kid-friendly (and kid-sized) yoga mat is 3mm thick and features a “sticky” textured surface to help keep little hands and feet grounded during poses. 

  • 3mm thick
  • "Sticky” textured surface to give kids the grip they need
  • Lightweight and easy to carry
  • Comes with our lifetime guarantee

Measurements: 60"L x 24"W x 3mm.

Materials: PVC. Latex-Free. 

Care Instructions: Yoga mats release a very strong but harmless odor when first unwrapped. Please unroll and air out your mat for 2-3 days before use. Spot clean with our Yoga Mat Wash or damp cloth with cold water and mild detergent. Dry flat. The mat may fade and become brittle and unusable if exposed to the sun for extended periods of time. We recommend storing your mat in a mat bag when not in use. Learn more about How to Remove That New Yoga Mat Smell.

products.title: Premium Santorini Yoga Mat (6mm)
products.body_html:
Let your mind wander to Santorini and crystal clear ocean views with the Premium Santorini Yoga Mat. 6mm of premium cushioning with a stable non-slip surface, will help you keep strong and grounded during any pose or practice. Lightweight and durable, this mat is perfect for home use or at the studio.

  • Non-slip surface
  • 6mm of premium cushioning
  • Ideal for home or studio use
  • Lightweight and durable
  • Latex-free

Materials: PVC. Latex-Free. 

Care Instructions: Printed yoga mats release a very strong but harmless odor when first unwrapped. Please unroll and air out your mat for 2-3 days before use. Spot clean with our Yoga Mat Wash or damp cloth with cold water and mild detergent. Dry flat. The mat may fade and become brittle and unusable if exposed to the sun for extended periods of time. We recommend storing your mat in a mat bag when not in use. Learn more about How to Remove That New Yoga Mat Smell.

products.body_html:
Perfect for yoga or just meditation, the Vibrant Flourish yoga mat features a calming, floral-inspired print to help you ground down and relax. The 4mm of cushioning keeps you comfortable and the textured grippy surface keeps you stable during any pose or practice. Lightweight and portable, this mat is ideal for home or studio use.
